ItemTooltips.boots: Every hero needs boots to run faster.
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Good when the enemy team casts lots of spells.
ItemTooltips.flask: Good HP regen when you are low.
ItemTooltips.bottle: Allows you to control runes and restore HP and Mana.
ItemTooltips.tango: Good heal for when you are harassed.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: Very powerful disable and good stats.
ItemTooltips.orchid: Powerful silence if your team needs it.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Allows for better positioning as well as escaping.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Allows you to do more damage with your Thundergod's Wrath.
ItemTooltips.refresher: Allows you to use your Ultimate twice.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Gives you and your team lots of Mana.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Good stats for you and a good aura.
ItemTooltips.veil_of_discord: Makes all of your spells do more damage.

AbilityTooltips.zuus_arc_lightning: Does good damage when you have the Mana to cast it often. Use it in lane to get last hits.
AbilityTooltips.zuus_lightning_bolt: Very powerful nuke, use it to kill enemies.
AbilityTooltips.zuus_static_field: Allows you to do lots of damage by casting often.
AbilityTooltips.zuus_thundergods_wrath: Powerful ultimate that damages everyone. Use it in team fights.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: Take these when you have to.
